https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pA29X1mszN8PUvATWisz3fFA7KX.jpg A woman is afflicted with an unusual condition; she cries all the time, at the slightest provocation regardless of whether she's happy or sad, beset by anxieties or problem-free. Nicknamed "Madame Ho", this pitiful woman strives to play a more visible role in a household that continually belittles her. Crazy Crying Lady
